price: 35. Y sacamos de la ciudad (para salvarlos) a quienes eran creyentes.
arabic: فَأَخۡرَجۡنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: fa-akhrajnā man kāna fīhā mina al-mu'minīna
